column4: hello, i need help. can anybody tell me the "yahoo plugin" for video/voice chat with empathy? what should i install?
Empathy doesn't support video for yahoo.
according to this it's not supported, though that could very well be out of date: http://live.gnome.org/Empathy/FAQ#For_which_protocols_does_Empathy_support_audio_and_video_chat.3F
